回覆店長Sandy的問題，前往消費的日期是2/20，當天我是和另一位男性友人前往，我們都點了同樣的品項，而當天值班的bar tender直到結帳之前都沒有告知價格，如果有疑慮的話可以和當天排班的人員求證。但除此之外我必須說，除了沒有提前告知價格之外，其他的服務都是100分，謝謝Sandy回覆這則留言，敬祝 商祈
EN:
Damo added an ice cup of 800 in 15 years, and 10%of the service fee 880. I have never drank such expensive ones. Even if it is in a bar in the Eastern District or Xinyi District, it is impossible for this price. Fortunately In 15 years, if you order Hibiki, you may stay here before going out.After checking the outlet price of a bottle of 2780, it is equivalent to expensing three cups of your store to go back to the whole bottle back. It is enough to do business.A star is given the outstanding business mind of Guidian.

—————————————————

The question of replying to the store manager Sandy is 2/20 for the consumption. I went to another male friend on the same day. If you have any doubt, you can verify with the person in the class that day.But in addition, I have to say that except for not informing the price in advance, the other services are 100 points. Thank you Sandy to reply to this message and wish you a message.

Will come again!Bleak

我真的很喜歡這個酒吧的氛圍。音樂選擇非常適合氛圍，並且播放音量合理，因此我們仍然可以很好地聽到彼此的聲音。

食物和飲料也很好。這是一個非常適合約會的酒吧。

I really like the atmosphere of this bar.Music selection is very suitable for the atmosphere, and the volume is reasonable, so we can still hear each other's voice well.

Food and drinks are also very good.This is a very suitable bar.
